605160.name: Perfect Plan
605160.description:
"Perfect Plan" is a high-octane first-person shooter and platforming game where players embark on a daring heist to steal a crypto key worth half a city. Set in a futuristic world, the game involves shooting hostile robots and strategically planting explosives on specific spots to create diversions, outsmarting the police. The mission culminates with thrilling platforming, shooting your way through five major locations, and destroying crazy-hard bosses. Make sure to collect enough coins and buy health at the right time to fully prepare for the final boss, Demonitor.

FEATURES


  • Uncapped Health: Perfect Plan introduces a rare health system that allows players to loot health as much as they can, be a tank, offering a dynamic and strategic approach to timing of buying health.



  • Launchable Shield: Players can deploy a protective shield, adding tactical depth and defense against enemy fire in the heat of battle. Spawn as many as you can and gamble it all on one target.

  • Shoot 'Em Up: The game is an action-packed first-person shooter, with intense firefights and a focus on tanking bullets but also throwing heavy punch, Its all about player placement.



  • Ladder Climbing: The ability to jump from ladder to ladder adds verticality to the gameplay, enabling agile movement and a mix of mini challange in the name of game progression.

  • Auto-Aim: Perfect Plan features a well-tuned auto-aim system, making FPS gameplay smooth and enjoyable when using a controller, enhancing accessibility and immersion for all players.
